plot: Four lads on a Friday night - time to meet chicks, time to get wasted. Growing up isn't on the agenda, or so they think.
title: A God of Sinners
plot_es: Four lads on a Friday night - time to meet chicks, time to get wasted. Growing up isn't on the agenda, or so they think.
